meanings.sent1: He enjoyed smoking a panatela after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The gentleman lit up a panatela and puffed contentedly.
meanings.sent3: The panatela looked like a tiny chimney in his hand.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the panatela filled the room with a sense of sophistication.
meanings.sent5: She gifted him a panatela to celebrate his promotion.

meanings.sent1: The panatela wrapper added a subtle sweetness to the cigar.
meanings.sent2: He carefully unwrapped the panatela to reveal the tobacco inside.
meanings.sent3: The panatela wrapper crinkled like autumn leaves under his touch.
meanings.sent4: The panatela wrapper hugged the cigar tightly, preserving its flavor.
meanings.sent5: She admired the intricate design on the panatela wrapper.
